analysis.key_quote: It is painful to watch the destruction of our government, the function of which should be to serve the American people, through the removal of competent people who demonstrate expertise in their fields.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the removal of competent federal workers based on loyalty to the Trump administration rather than merit. It emphasizes the importance of a merit-based system and the integrity of government service.
